name: Calebs Adventure Level Maker
description:
Jump! Avoid Obstacles! And share new levels with your friends for them to complete!

Welcome to my first c++ game! I've been working on this for a little bit but I wanted to show you how I've came along so far, which is not much for now but will increase into the future!

Very simple so it doesn't require heavy graphics

A Linux version will come very soon (Debian Type executable)

This may give a false alarm as a virus since it's not verified.
